name: Boar'd'hell
description:
/!\ Doesn't work with Firefox, please use chromium based browser /!\

Your main goal is to score by collecting wheat and dodge boars and obstacles on your path.

You are alone to drive the two machines. The game ends when you break one of them.

Keep the wheat stream in the trailer to build up a multiplier.

Compare your score with ours on the scoreboard! (share it with us ;P)

Default controls are (you can change them) :

Q / D to move the truck left and right

left arrow / right arrow to move the combine

Z to honk and fear the boars

S to repair the horn (it breaks every time you use it)

up arrow / down arrow to move where the wheat is yeeted
